Creates a new memory segment that represents the memory backing the given direct byte buffer._Note that the given ByteBuffer must be direct {@link java.nio.ByteBuffer#allocateDirect(int)},_otherwise this method with throw an IllegalArgumentException._

_The owner referenced by this memory segment is null.__@param buffer The byte buffer whose memory is represented by this memory segment._@throws IllegalArgumentException Thrown, if the given ByteBuffer is not direct.
codeText: HybridMemorySegment(ByteBuffer buffer) {_		this(buffer, null)__	}
